subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A skeptic blog/article.
author: Eric VanDuzer
full_text:
Honestly Frank I say slap too.  I know that I am not very active in this
group but I do read everything.  To me that was a pure attack.  Yes they are
debunkers and they won't believe anything, but if you don't say anything and
just back down there is that one person out there that will be swayed they
way of the skeptic and will not here our side.  Slap away and let us be
heard and get our opinions and beliefs out there.  If it touches one person
(Like me I used to be one of those "debunkers" then I heard the stuff that
comes through ITC and EVP research) it is worth the carpal tunnel.  And to
add I am a investigator who still uses a debunking aspect toward the
investigation,  but I am also a researcher and if there is something new out
there I am always willing to test it and see what comes through.
